hellow person_2 do you know why you are here?

yea, that's correct!

lets save the children,yea

I think that what is happening with Save The Children is a good idea.  I especially like the Send A Girl To School program.
i love that idea too! now everyone has an opportunity.
Exactly.  Often time little girls are left behind in third world countries.  Very, very sad.

indeed, it\'s very sad many children have to endure these conditions, just as a friendly reminder "How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment."
